channel.title: Help with 317 Client please. (Renaming Client title, Renaming Background File)
channel.description:
Hey guys, I have encountered some problems with my 317 clients. Hopefully you guys out there can help me out. ;)
1) I know that to change a client background to mine can be done by deleting the old background picture and uploading the new one and renaming it to the same name as the old one but I would want to rename my new background picture to the name of my own, how can it be done?
2) How can I name my client with a title on the java client?
3) How do I remove the old login box and change it with my own custom one and make sure that it's working fine? (I tried deleting "loginbox" from the spirits file and the whole client went screwed up ^^
Thanks you in advance.
Sincerely,

item.title: Help with 317 Client please. (Renaming Client title, Renaming Background File)
item.dc:creator: @Sanskrit Sanskrit
item.description:
@Sanskrit wrote:

[quote=“stickywicky, post:2, topic:366077”]1) to completely change the backgorud you need to edit some of the files in thier so if your new id not recomend changing the name

2)to title your client go into 1 of the class files and search for “title” its what i did . or search for the current title name

  1. to change logn box open the imageright click -> edit it will oepn in paint then try editing it

gl[/quote]

No.

  1. The background image name is in sprite.java, just search the current image name and you will find it.

  2. I think the title is in Frame_Sub.java, or something along those lines.

  3. The login box sprite is in the cache, you can use Tom’ s Cache Suite to unpack the cache, switch out the image, and repack the cache to its original file type.

Read full topic
item.source: Help with 317 Client please. (Renaming Client title, Renaming Background File)

2)to title your client go into 1 of the class files and search for “title” its what i did . or search for the current title name

gl
